description: Sum_{i=1..m, d(i)>d(i-1)} d(i)-d(i-1), where Sum_{i=0..m} d(i)*4^i is the base 4 representation of n.
links: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: A037854 := proc(n)    a := 0 ;    dgs := convert(n,base,4);    for i from 2 to nops(dgs) do        if op(i,dgs)>op(i-1,dgs) then            a := a+op(i,dgs)-op(i-1,dgs) ;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 19 2015
mathematica: d[n_] := d[n] = Differences[RealDigits[n, 4][[1]]]Table[Total[Select[d[n], # > 0 &]], {n, 1, z}];  (* A037845 *)-Table[Total[Select[d[n], # < 0 &]], {n, 1, z}]; (* A037854 *)(* _Clark Kimberling_, Oct 20 2015 *)
